text: There have been several Sesame Street video games made for video game platforms. Most of the Sesame Street video games were published and developed by NewKidCo. == Video games == ===Elmo's ABCs=== Elmo's ABCs is a video game. It was made for the Game Boy Color. It was made on March 1, 1999.https://www.amazon.com/Sesame-Street-Elmos-Game-Boy- Color/dp/B00002ST5Q/ref=sr_1_1?keywords=elmoâ€™s+abc&qid;=1581730800&s;=videogames&sr;=1-1 ===The Adventures of Elmo in Grouchland=== The Adventures of Elmo in Grouchland is a video game. Like Elmo's ABCs, it was made both in 1999 and both were made for the Game Boy Color. There is also a version for Windows and the original Game Boy. ===Elmo's Letter Adventure=== Elmo's Letter Adventure is a video game. It was made for the Nintendo 64.https://www.amazon.com/Elmos- Letter-Adventure-Pc/dp/B00001ZUMO It was made in 1999. == References == Category:Sesame Street
title: List of Sesame Street video games
